my dad was a cop until he was killed.

content.text: Hi there, I'm participant_1. I live in a small apartment with my dog.
Hi participant_2, nice to meet you. I'm participant_2, I'm an Indian-American wedding photographer.
Nice to meet you, too. What made you want to become a wedding photographer?
I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world.
That's a great reason. I'm sure you're very good at it.
Thank you! I do my best.
What's your favorite memory from when you were a kid?
I have so many good memories from when I was a kid. But one of my favorites is when my dad took me to the skatepark for the first time.
That sounds like a lot of fun. My dad was a cop until he was killed when I was young.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm sure he was a great dad.
He was. He was the best.
Do you have any other hobbies or interests?
I like to spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better.
That's really interesting. I've never met anyone who has alpacas.
They're great animals. They're really gentle and they're good for stress relief.
